tool_description:
This API provides an easy way to analyze websites with Ecoindex. You have the ability to:

- Make a page analysis
- Define screen resolution
- Save results to a DB
- Retrieve results
- Limit the number of request per day for a given host

This API is built on top of ecoindex-python with FastAPI
name: Ecoindex
title: Ecoindex

api_list.name: Get_healthcheck_health_get
api_list.description: Check health status of components of the API (database...)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecoindex.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecoindex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ecoindex.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecoindex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

healthy.title: Set to true if all workers are healthy, false if one of them is down
Set to true if the worker is healthy, else false

workers.title: List of all current known workers
Status of the queue task broker

api_list.name: Get_host_list__version__hosts_get
api_list.description: This returns a list of hosts that ran an ecoindex analysis order by most request made

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: Engine version used to run the analysis (v0 or v1)

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description: Start date of the filter elements (example: 2020-01-01)

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: End date of the filter elements  (example: 2020-01-01)

api_list.name: Get_screenshot__version__ecoindexes__id__screenshot_get
api_list.description: This returns the screenshot of the webpage analysis if it exists

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: Engine version used to run the analysis (v0 or v1)

api_list.name: Get_ecoindex_analysis_list__version__ecoindexes_get
api_list.description: This returns a list of ecoindex analysis corresponding to query filters and the given version engine. The results are ordered by ascending date

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: Engine version used to run the analysis (v0 or v1)

optional_parameters.name: host
optional_parameters.description: Host name you want to filter

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description: Start date of the filter elements (example: 2020-01-01)

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: End date of the filter elements  (example: 2020-01-01)

ecoindex_version.description: Is the version of the ecoindex used to compute the score
ecoindex_version.title: Ecoindex version

ges.description: Is the equivalent of greenhouse gases emission (in `gCO2e`) of the page
ges.title: Ecoindex GES equivalent

grade.description: Is the corresponding ecoindex grade of the page (from A to G)
grade.title: Ecoindex grade

height.description: Height of the simulated window in pixel
height.title: Page Height

host.description: Host name of the web page
host.title: Web page host

initial_ranking.description: This is the initial rank of the analysis. This is an indicator of the ranking at the time of the analysis for a given version.
initial_ranking.title: Analysis rank

initial_total_results.description: This is the initial total number of analysis. This is an indicator of the total number of analysis at the time of the analysis for a given version.
initial_total_results.title: Total number of analysis

nodes.description: Is the number of the DOM elements in the page
nodes.title: Page nodes

page_type.description: Is the type of the page, based ton the [opengraph type tag](https://ogp.me/#types)
page_type.title: Page type

requests.description: Is the number of external requests made by the page
requests.title: Page requests

score.description: Is the corresponding ecoindex score of the page (0 to 100)
score.title: Ecoindex score

size.description: Is the size of the page and of the downloaded elements of the page in KB
size.title: Page size

version.description: Version number of the API used to run the test
version.title: API version

water.description: Is the equivalent water consumption (in `cl`) of the page
water.title: Ecoindex Water equivalent

width.description: Width of the simulated window in pixel
width.title: Page Width

api_list.name: Get_ecoindex_analysis_by_id__version__ecoindexes__id__get
api_list.description: This returns an ecoindex given by its unique identifier

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: Engine version used to run the analysis (v0 or v1)

api_list.name: Get_ecoindex_analysis_task_by_id_v1_tasks_ecoindexes__id__get
api_list.description: This returns an ecoindex given by its unique identifier
